content: this legal text discusses the division of property between two parties referred to as pal and pt the property in question is located in castelfidardo and consists of multiple apartments garages and warehouses the parties have agreed to divide the property into two shares pal will retain ownership of certain units including apartments on the first and second floors a garage and a warehouse pt will retain ownership of other units including a ground floor apartment and a cellar the value of each share is determined to be 108000 euros the text also mentions the need for corrections to the cadastral identification of the properties
